answers.answer: Hi and welcome to the GERD forum,.My first thought was do u have a hiatial hernia too?....When u do exercise u could be causing the acids to migrate up into the esophagus...U r lucky that with Hashi's ur cholesterol is in normal ranges....I also have it and can not seem to get them in range.....even when on thyroid meds....Stress can cause GERD symptoms to flare....Look to family history, and always get ur heart checked  to be sure....and have a study to compare to in the future.
